title: About flowers
creator_credit: Rene Jodoin, Frank Spiller and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A nature lesson taught in a field of flowers. Two children playing in a meadow learn from an elderly neighbour about the recurring growth cycle of the flowering plant. They see how and why flowers attract bees, how fertilisation occurs, how seeds form and new plants come to life in spring. Suitable for primary school level.
